metadata.title: CVE-2023-39456 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Apache Traffic Server withmalformed HTTP/2 frames.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from9.0.0 through 9.2.2. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 9.2.3,which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
